page.title: 04 Farm Survey
page.content: Within the 3x4 kilometre area of the Maplesteads and Wickham St.Paul there are 4 predominant farms:- ACRES Byham Hall,Parks Farm 760 Chelmshoe 570 Moat Farm 550 Lucking and Monks Farm 550 Visits were made by 6-8 children from St.Giles during May,June and July.Prior to the visit,each owner was asked to complete a questionnaire covering: arable,livestock,farm machinery,woodland,game and water besides a general introduction.In addition a detailed field map was completed indicating the 1985 crop plans.These surveys showed conclusively that besides one major beef cattle herd on Chelmshoe and a large table bird (chickens) throughput at Lucking, arable farming is the main business.
